msgstr.undoRedo-help: Undo or redo the last command
msgstr.redoEdit-help: Redo the last command that was undone
msgstr.purgeUndoHistory-help: Delete undo history to reclaim memory
msgstr.alignObjects: Align two or more objects along the given axis according to their respective selection centers
msgstr.centerObjects: Center the selected objects along the given axis according to their cumulative selection center
msgstr.setDefaultAxis-help: Define and store axis (with ref. point) for later use with any
msgstr.virtualMirrorCreate-help: Given a face selection, set up a virtual mirror
msgstr.virtualMirrorBreak-help: Remove virtual mirrors for all objects
msgstr.virtualMirrorFreeze-help: Create real geometry from the virtual mirrors
msgstr.screenshot-help: Grab an image of the window (export it from the outliner)
msgstr.sceneInfo-help: Calculate area and volume for each object in the scene
msgstr.putOnGround-help: Put selected objects on the ground plane
msgstr.unitize-help: Scale selected objects to fit inside a unit sphere and move to origin
msgstr.boundingBox-help: Bounding boxes are useful for scaling or aligning objects
msgstr.saveBoundingBox-help: Create bounding box around current selection
msgstr.outliner-help: Open the outliner window (showing materials and objects)
msgstr.geometryGraph-help: Open a Geometry Graph window (showing objects)
msgstr.tweakPalette-help: Open palettes from which tweak tools may be selected or bound to modifier keys
msgstr.areaLightToObject-help: Convert selected area lights to objects
msgstr.objectToAreaLight-help: Convert selected objects to area lights
msgstr.selectAxisToFlip: Select axis to flip object along
msgstr.selectPointAxisToFlip: Select axis to flip object along
msgstr.bodyFlipX-help: Flip the object along X axis
msgstr.bodyFlipY-help: Flip the object along Y axis
msgstr.bodyFlipZ-help: Flip the object along Z axis
msgstr.flipAxis-helpM: Pick point to flip object along the {} axis
msgstr.flipAxis-helpR: Flip object along the global {} axis
msgstr.bodyInvert-help: Flip all normals, turning the object inside out
msgstr.bodySubdivide-help: Subdivide all faces to give the object a smoother apperance
msgstr.bodyCombine-help: Combine multiple objects into a single object
msgstr.bodySeparate-help: Separate a combined objects into its components
msgstr.bodyWeld-help: Merge pair of faces that are nearly coincident
msgstr.autoSmooth-help: Set edges hard or soft depending on the angle between faces
msgstr.showAll-help: Show all faces for this object
msgstr.pickAxis-help: Pick axis to flip object along
msgstr.pickAxisPoint-help: Pick axis and point to flip object along
msgstr.pickGlobalAxis-help: Pick global axis to flip object along
msgstr.removeAllAttribute-help: Remove all vertex colors and UV coordinates
msgstr.prefixSelected-help: Add a common prefix to each selected object
msgstr.bodyColor-help: Apply vertex colors to selected objects
msgstr.badDissolve: Dissolving would cause a badly formed face.
msgstr.cutLine2-help: Cut into 2 edges of equal length
msgstr.cutLine3-help: Cut into 3 edges of equal length
msgstr.cutLine4-help: Cut into 4 edges of equal length
msgstr.cutLine5-help: Cut into 5 edges of equal length
msgstr.cutLine10-help: Cut into 10 edges of equal length
msgstr.cutEqual: Cut into edges of equal length
msgstr.cutError: Only one edge can be cut at an arbitrary position.
msgstr.edgeLoopError: Edge loop doesn't divide object #{} into two (or more) parts.
msgstr.cutAndConnect-help: Create a new edge by connecting midpoints of selected edges
msgstr.edgeCollapse-help: Delete edges, replacing them with vertices
msgstr.edgeLoopCut-help: Cut into two objects along edge loop
msgstr.edgeVertexColor-help: Apply vertex colors to selected edges
msgstr.edgeCrease-help: Extrusion commonly used for adding wrinkles to organic models
msgstr.cutEqualEdge: Cut into edges of equal length
msgstr.objectTooSmallBevel: Object is too small to bevel.
msgstr.cannotExtrudeBevel:
Can't extrude/bevel; two or more vertices are probably too near to each other.
Try the Cleanup command.
msgstr.faceNotSameDirection: Faces must not point in the same direction.
msgstr.twoFaceRegionsSelected: Exactly two face regions must be selected.
msgstr.cloneOnSelection: Select target elements on which to put clones
msgstr.faceLift-help: Lift, rotating face around edge or vertex
msgstr.faceIntrude-help: Carve out interior of object, making selected faces holes
msgstr.faceBevel-help: Round off edges of selected faces
msgstr.faceBridge-help: Create a bridge or tunnel between two faces
msgstr.facePutOn-help: Move and rotate object, aligning the selected face to another element
msgstr.putOn-helpR: Clone object on to one or more elements
msgstr.faceMirror-help: Mirror object around selected faces and merge to object
msgstr.faceDissolve-help: Eliminate all edges between selected faces
msgstr.faceCollapse-help: Delete faces, replacing them with vertices
msgstr.faceSubdivide-help: Subdivide selected faces to smooth them (Catmull-Clark)
msgstr.faceColor-help: Apply vertex colors to selected faces
msgstr.faceHide-helpR: Eliminate selected faces and remove remaining isolated verts
msgstr.faceHole-helpR: Remove holes adjacent to selected faces
msgstr.onlyOneFace: There must be only one face selected.
msgstr.selectionNotSame: Selection must not be in the same object.
msgstr.selectTargetElement: Select target element on which to put source object
msgstr.saveChangeBeforeQuit: Do you want to save your changes before quitting?
msgstr.fileMovedOrDeleted: This file has been moved or deleted.
msgstr.merge-help: Merge a previously saved scene into the current scene
msgstr.saveAs-help: Save the current scene under a new name
msgstr.saveSelectedDot-help: Save only the selected objects or faces
msgstr.revert-help: Revert current scene to the saved contents
msgstr.askSaveChanges: Do you want to save your changes?
msgstr.askToLoadNewerAutoSaved: An autosaved file with a later time stamp exists; do you want to load the autosaved file instead?
msgstr.folderAlreadyExists: A folder by that name already exists
msgstr.moveSelectedToFolder: Move selected objects to this folder
msgstr.toggleVisible: Toogle all visible objects or show menu
msgstr.chooseName-help: Matching objects to be renamed. *'s may be used as wildcards
msgstr.replace-help: New name. Use % to indicate numbered objects and %number% for the start counter
msgstr.edgeMoveNormal-help: Move each element along its normal
msgstr.edgeMoveFree-help: Move each element freely in all directions
msgstr.edgeMoveX-help: Move each element along the X axis
msgstr.edgeMoveY-help: Move each element along the Y axis
msgstr.edgeMoveZ-help: Move each element along the Z axis
msgstr.faceMoveNormal-help: Move each element along its normal
msgstr.faceMoveFree-help: Move each element freely in all directions
msgstr.faceMoveX-help: Move each element along the X axis
msgstr.faceMoveY-help: Move each element along the Y axis
msgstr.faceMoveZ-help: Move each element along the Z axis
msgstr.vertexMoveNormal-help: Move each element along its normal
msgstr.vertexMoveFree-help: Move each element freely in all directions
msgstr.vertexMoveX-help: Move each element along the X axis
msgstr.vertexMoveY-help: Move each element along the Y axis
msgstr.vertexMoveZ-help: Move each element along the Z axis
msgstr.bodyMoveFree-help: Move each element freely in all directions
msgstr.bodyMoveX-help: Move each element along the X axis
msgstr.bodyMoveY-help: Move each element along the Y axis
msgstr.bodyMoveZ-help: Move each element along the Z axis
msgstr.edgeExtrudeNormal-help: Extrude each element, then move it along its normal
msgstr.edgeExtrudeFree-help: Extrude each element, then move it freely in all directions
msgstr.edgeExtrudeX-help: Extrude elements, then move along the X axis
msgstr.edgeExtrudeY-help: Extrude elements, then move along the Y axis
msgstr.edgeExtrudeZ-help: Extrude elements, then move along the Z axis
msgstr.vertexExtrudeNormal-help: Extrude each element, then move it along its normal
msgstr.vertexExtrudeFree-help: Extrude each element, then move it freely in all directions
msgstr.vertexExtrudeX-help: Extrude elements, then move along the X axis
msgstr.vertexExtrudeY-help: Extrude elements, then move along the Y axis
msgstr.vertexExtrudeZ-help: Extrude elements, then move along the Z axis
msgstr.faceExtrudeNormal-help: Extrude faces as region, then move faces along the region's normal
msgstr.faceExtrudeFree-help: Extrude faces as region, then move faces freely in all directions
msgstr.faceExtrudeX-help: Extrude faces as region, then move along the X axis
msgstr.faceExtrudeY-help: Extrude faces as region, then move along the Y axis
msgstr.faceExtrudeZ-help: Extrude faces as region, then move along the Z axis
msgstr.edgeScaleUniform-help: Scale uniformly from midpoint of selection
msgstr.faceScaleUniform-help: Scale uniformly from midpoint of selection
msgstr.vertexScaleUniform-help: Scale uniformly from midpoint of selection
msgstr.bodyScaleUniform-help: Scale uniformly from midpoint of selection
msgstr.bodyDuplicateMoveX-help: Duplicate, then move along the X axis
msgstr.bodyDuplicateMoveY-help: Duplicate, then move along the Y axis
msgstr.bodyDuplicateMoveZ-help: Duplicate, then move along the Z axis
msgstr.createNormalMap-help: Creates a normal map for the image
msgstr.assigntoSelection-help: Assign the material to the selected faces or bodies
msgstr.vectorLength-help: Length of vector in secondary selections
msgstr.customizeDragResponse-help: Customize the drag to mouse motion ratio. Unchecked uses default settings.
msgstr.unselectedSize-help: Size in pixels of unselected vertices (0.0 means not shown)
msgstr.selectedSize-help: Size in pixels of selected vertices
msgstr.unselectedWidth-help: Width in pixels of unselected edges
msgstr.selectedWidth-help: Width in pixels of selected edges
msgstr.background-help: Color of background for information text (including transparency)
msgstr.forceAxis-AlignedGrid-help: Always show the grid when the view is aligned along one of the major axes
msgstr.materialDefault-help: Sets the colour of the default material
msgstr.hardEdgeWidth-help: Width in pixels of hard edges
msgstr.verbose-help: Show additional information about selected elements
msgstr.magnetMaskVertexSize-help: Size in pixels of magnet mask vertices
msgstr.forceAxis-AlignedOrtho-help: Always go into orthogonal mode when the view is aligned along one of the major axes
msgstr.name: Name
msgstr.similarNormals-help: Select faces with normals similar to those of the already selected faces
msgstr.similarArea-help: Select faces with areas similar to that of the already selected face
msgstr.similarMaterial-help: Select faces with a similar material to those already selected
msgstr.oneFaceMustSelected: Exactly one face must be selected
msgstr.cycleInSelectionMode-help: Cycle Prev/Next only within active selection mode
msgstr.storeSelection-help: Store the selection into the selection group named "StoredSelection"
msgstr.recallSelection-help: Recall the selection from the selection group named "StoredSelection"
msgstr.less-help: Deselect all elements adjacent to the unselected elements
msgstr.similar-help: Select elements similar to the already selected elements
msgstr.edgeLoop1-help: Expand edge selection to loop; convert face selection to selected border edges; convert consecutive vertices to edges
msgstr.edgeLoopRegion-help: Select all faces on one side of an edge loop
msgstr.growEde-help: Grow edge selection by one edge in loop directions
msgstr.shrinkEdgeLoop-help: Shrink edge selection by one in loop direction
msgstr.growEdgeRing-help: Grow edge selection by one edge in ring direction
msgstr.shrinkEdgeRing-help: Shrink edge selection by one edge in ring directions
msgstr.more-help: Select all elements adjacent to the selected elements
msgstr.oneFaceMustBeSelected: At least one face must be selected
msgstr.connectCutError: Defined only for two or three selected vertices, per object.
msgstr.vertexConnect-help: Create a new edge by connecting selected vertices
msgstr.vertexTighten-help: Move selected vertices towards average midpoint
msgstr.vertexCollapse-help: Delete selected vertices (creating a face selection)
msgstr.vertexColor-help: Apply vertex colors to selected vertices
msgstr.vertexConnect-helpR: Connect vertices and return the new edge selected
msgstr.vertexConnect-helpM: Create new edges through faces between two selected vertices
msgstr.toggleOrtho-help: Toggle between orthographic and perspective views
msgstr.facePlaneCutX-help: Cut faces around the X axis
msgstr.facePlaneCutY-help: Cut faces around the Y axis
msgstr.facePlaneCutZ-help: Cut faces around the Z axis
msgstr.bodyPlaneCutX-help: Cut object around the X axis
msgstr.bodyPlaneCutY-help: Cut object around the Y axis
msgstr.bodyPlaneCutZ-help: Cut object around the Z axis
msgstr.bodySlice-help: Slice objects into equal parts along standard axis
msgstr.bodySliceX-help: Slice into equal parts along the X axis
msgstr.bodySliceY-help: Slice into equal parts along the Y axis
msgstr.bodySliceZ-help: Slice into equal parts along the Z axis
msgstr.edgeCorner-help: Make corners from edge rings capped by a 3 and 5 sided face
msgstr.vertexWeld-help: Weld selected vertex to another (sharing common edge)
msgstr.faceInset-help: Inset a face inside each selected face
msgstr.multi-help: Deselect all, return to empty selection
